  • Method Details

    • findNextClosestHorse

      public int findNextClosestHorse​(src.MetricsGraph graph)
      Finds the closest horse to the plane in the graph this is the same as calling findClosestHorseToNode(graph,src.MetricsGraph.PLANE_INDEX)
      Parameters:
      graph - the graph
      Returns:
      index of the closest horse to the node, or -1 if no horse

    • findClosestHorseToNode

      public int findClosestHorseToNode​(src.MetricsGraph graph, int node)
      Finds the closest src.Horse meeting some requirements (see below) in the graph to the node on the specified index in the graph note that horses start at index = 2!

      the requirements: the plane can load it (capacity-wise)
      the horse is at most 1000 units far
      the horse has not yet been visited

      Parameters:
      graph - the graph
      node - the node index in the graph's node array
      Returns:
      index of the closest horse to the node, or -1 if no horse

    • canGetHorse

      private boolean canGetHorse​(src.MetricsGraph graph, int horseIndex)
      All the conditions for a plane to be able to get the horse
      Parameters:
      graph - the graph
      horseIndex - the checked horse
      Returns:
      true, if the horse is a good candidate
